mapper.select: SELECT id, amendment_id, ordinance_id, need_revision, revision_urgency, affected_articles, reason, recommendation, status, reviewed_by, reviewed_at, created_at FROM amendment_reviews WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, amendment_id, ordinance_id, need_revision, revision_urgency, affected_articles, reason, recommendation, status, reviewed_by, reviewed_at, created_at FROM amendment_reviews ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO amendment_reviews ( amendment_id, ordinance_id, need_revision, revision_urgency, affected_articles, reason, recommendation, status, reviewed_by, reviewed_at, created_at ) VALUES ( #{amendmentId}, #{ordinanceId}, #{needRevision}, #{revisionUrgency}, #{affectedArticles}, #{reason}, #{recommendation}, #{status}, #{reviewedBy}, #{reviewedAt}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE amendment_reviews SET amendment_id = #{amendmentId}, ordinance_id = #{ordinanceId}, need_revision = #{needRevision}, revision_urgency = #{revisionUrgency}, affected_articles = #{affectedArticles}, reason = #{reason}, recommendation = #{recommendation}, status = #{status}, reviewed_by = #{reviewedBy}, reviewed_at = #{reviewedAt}, created_at = #{createdAt} WHERE id = #{id}
